about_the_game:
Experience life as different dinosaurs and prehistoric creatures. Play as the plant eating herbivores, the meat-eating carnivores, and the fish-eating piscivores.

Roam the land, seas, and skies. Eat, grow, and survive in an unforgiving world filled with many species of creatures that can help you, be hunted, or hunt you.

Earn evolution points by eating, killing, and completing tasks. Spend those points to customize your creature's attributes such as damage or health.

Collect a hoard of items that can be used to strengthen your creatures, nests, and eggs.

🔹62 playable species include:

Ankylosaurus, Archelon, Brachiosaurus, Compsognathus, Dilophosaurus, Dimetrodon, Oviraptor, Parasaurolophus, Pteranodon, Sarcosuchus, Spinosaurus, Stegosaurus, Triceratops, Tryannosaurus, Velociraptor, Argentinosaurus, Baryonyx, Carnotaurus, Gallimimus, Iguanodon, Kentrosaurus, Ouranosaurus, Pachycephalosaurus, Protoceratops, Styracosaurus, Troodon, Dimorphodon, Quetzalcoatlus, Ammonite, Anomalocaris, Cameroceras, Dunkleosteus, Elasmosaurus, Helicoprion, Ophthalmosaurus, Leedsichthys, Megalodon, Tylosaurus, Onchopristis, Xenacanthus, Meganeura, Titanoboa, Trilobite, Skorpiovenator, Suchomimus, Diplocaulus, Edmontosaurus, Padillasaurus, Kryptops, Giganotosaurus, Daspletosaurus, Ceratosaurus, Allosaurus, Inostrancevia, Gorgosaurus, Albertosaurus, Thalassodromeus, Dryosaurus, Acrocanthosaurus, and Therizinosaurus.

Roam the land, seas, and skies. Eat, grow, and survive in an unforgiving world filled with many species of creatures that can help you, be hunted, or hunt you.

Earn evolution points by eating, killing, and completing tasks. Spend those points to customize your creature's attributes such as damage or health.

Collect a hoard of items that can be used to strengthen your creatures, nests, and eggs.

🔹62 playable species include:

Ankylosaurus, Archelon, Brachiosaurus, Compsognathus, Dilophosaurus, Dimetrodon, Oviraptor, Parasaurolophus, Pteranodon, Sarcosuchus, Spinosaurus, Stegosaurus, Triceratops, Tryannosaurus, Velociraptor, Argentinosaurus, Baryonyx, Carnotaurus, Gallimimus, Iguanodon, Kentrosaurus, Ouranosaurus, Pachycephalosaurus, Protoceratops, Styracosaurus, Troodon, Dimorphodon, Quetzalcoatlus, Ammonite, Anomalocaris, Cameroceras, Dunkleosteus, Elasmosaurus, Helicoprion, Ophthalmosaurus, Leedsichthys, Megalodon, Tylosaurus, Onchopristis, Xenacanthus, Meganeura, Titanoboa, Trilobite, Skorpiovenator, Suchomimus, Diplocaulus, Edmontosaurus, Padillasaurus, Kryptops, Giganotosaurus, Daspletosaurus, Ceratosaurus, Allosaurus, Inostrancevia, Gorgosaurus, Albertosaurus, Thalassodromeus, Dryosaurus, Acrocanthosaurus, and Therizinosaurus.
name: Primeval

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: WIndows 10
  • Memory: 32 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Dedicated Graphics Card
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 40 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 11
  • Memory: 32 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Dedicated Graphics Card
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 40 GB available space

short_description: Experience life as different dinosaurs and prehistoric creatures from various parts of the ecosystem. Eat, grow, and survive in an unforgiving world.
